data.name: Numeronyms
data.description:
A numeronym is a number-based word.

Numeronyms are commonly used in Computer Science for abbreviating names of some topics. (a11y = accessibility, i18n = internationalization, l10n = localization, k8 = kubernetes, etc...)

Read more here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Numeronym

In this kata, you are expected to write an algorithm for creating *simple* numeronyms from strings.


Write a function named `toNumeronym` which takes a `string` as an argument and returns "numeronymed" `string`.

If input string is shorter than 3 characters, function must return `false`.

Examples:
```javascript
  toNumeronym('internationalization') === 'i18n'
  toNumeronym('lol') === 'l1l'
  toNumeronym('xx') === false
  toNumeronym('') === false
```
